actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the income ceiling for qualified medicare beneficiaries from 100 percent to 133 percent of the poverty level beginning in 1993.

summary.text: Medicare Buy-In Extension Act of 1990 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend Medicaid coverage of Medicare (title XVIII of the Social Security Act) premiums, deductibles, and coinsurance payments after 1992 to Medicare beneficiaries whose income does not exceed 133 percent of the Federal poverty level.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the income ceiling for qualified medicare beneficiaries from 100 percent to 133 percent of the poverty level beginning in 1993.
